content: summer chubby bunnies are arriving to me june always marks the start of summer celebrating the first day of summer definitely has something to do with it but it s more than that june was when school was officially out for the summer where you would swim every day have endless amounts of ice cream stay up late and sleep in with this month s bunnies i wanted to create fun characters that reminded me of that national donut day is june 2nd so **a sprinkled donut bunny** was an absolute must then we have my favorite summertime fruit- **a pineapple ** plant lovers will fall in love with the **saguaro cactus bunny** just like i did and lastly we have the **pool bunny** who is ready for a day in the water just look at the flamingo floaty pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm 9mm plastic safety eyes 6mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins hot glue black felt doll glasses skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet double_crochet back loops only front loops only finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
